## MapGeoTool class

添加 geojson

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MapGeoTool extends ToolBase<ToolBaseOptions, MapGeoToolEvents>
```

**Extends:** ToolBase&lt;ToolBaseOptions, MapGeoToolEvents&gt;

## Example

```ts
const tool = new MapGeoTool({})

tool.enable()
tool.addGeo(config, false, config.id)
```
